title: Who Will Be Fired Next?
description:
Linda and Emily dive into the recent firings with the Flyers and the Canucks... what impact this has on both teams and how they can benefit from broadening their candidate pool. After that, they get into how Vegas' Robin Lehner has pulled out of the Olympics. Lastly, Emily wraps up with some exclusive news on the Arizona Coyotes.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
